channel.title: Error Connecting To Server
channel.description: So my server was just online today. Now it isn't letting people connect... Anyone know any possible reasons?

item.title: Error Connecting To Server
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

Jayden.:

When I used to host my own server, from my own PC. The port was always the issue; too see if your port is open go to http://canyouseeme.org/ and type in your port number. If it is successful it will say successful, if not it’ll appear saying it’s your port is not open.

I haven’t done the port forward. I can’t do it till i switch to a different Internet Provider. I use Hamachi and 2 people had problems connecting to me, when they were playing fine the other day.

Read full topic
